title: Drone Video Shows Listed Cargo Ship Near St. Simon's Sound, Georgia
text:
Drone footage recorded on September 8 shows the Golden Ray cargo ship that overturned in the early hours of that morning near St. Simon’s Sound, near Brunswick, Georgia.

The US Coast Guard evacuated crew members from a cargo ship, though, according to local broadcaster WSB-TV, four crew members are still missing.

All marine traffic into the port of Brunswick was halted in the aftermath of the incident.

The US Coast Guard said it worked with other local agencies on the evacuation. Credit: Michael Torras via Storyful
description: Drone footage recorded on September 8 shows the Golden Ray cargo ship that overturned in the early hours of that morning near St. Simon’s Sound, near Brunswick, Georgia. The US Coast Guard evacuated crew members from a cargo ship, though, according to local broadcaster WSB -TV , four crew members are still missing. All marine traffic into the port of Brunswick was halted in the aftermath of the incident. The US Coast Guard said it worked with other local agencies on the evacuation. Credit: Michael Torras via Storyful
